title: 放入mod后开启游戏出问题
author: amhsg123
txt_content:
mc是1.2.3版本的，也已经装了所需的modloader，开启游戏结果出现一串开不懂的英文
Mods loaded: 7
ModLoader 1.2.3
mod_MinecraftForge 1.4.1.60
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.2.3v3
mod_ReiMinimap v3.0_03汉化by大刘 [1.2.3]
mod_TooManyItems 1.2.2/1.2.3 2012-03-03
mod_CraftGuide 1.4.3 for Minecraft 1.2.3
mod_IC2 v1.81

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.
